document.full_text: texas instruments inc  is buying national semiconductor corp  for $6.5 billion, paying a hefty near-80 percent premium to merge two of the industry's oldest firms into a dominant force in analog microchips.
document.title: texas instruments to buy nat semi for $6.5 billion
lines_and_colors: texas instruments inc  is buying national semiconductor corp  for $6.5 billion, paying a hefty near-80 percent premium to merge two of the industry's oldest firms into a dominant force in analog microchips.
